content.rendered:
Capiteq Limited, trading as Airnorth, is a regional airline based at Darwin International Airport in Darwin, Northern Territory, Australia. It operates scheduled and charter services in the Northern Territory, Queensland, Victoria, Western Australia, and East Timor. Airnorth carries in excess of 300,000 passengers per year. Airnorth was established in 1978.

 

Airnorth Airlines Address : Darwin, Northern Territory, Australia.

Phone : 1800 627 474

Email: reservations@airnorth.com.au

Opening hours: 
Reservation hours of operation:

8.00am to 5.00pm Monday to Friday- Central Standard Time
For any enquiries outside of our Reservations operating hours, please contact our Afterhours Contact Centre on +61 8 8920 4003.

Afterhours Contact Centre hours of operation:

5:00am to 7:00pm Monday to Sunday- Central Standard Time
Please note that these times may vary in line with schedule requirements of Airnorth.

Airnorth Airlines Official website : https://www.airnorth.com.au/

Fleet size: 10

  • Embraer EMB-120
  • Embraer ERJ-170

Airnorth Airlines Baggage Allowance

Airnorth Airlines Baggage

View Airnorth Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Travelling While Pregnancy in Airnorth Airlines

  • International travel is not permitted after the 36th week for a routine single pregnancy or the 32nd week for routine multiple pregnancies.

For more details: https://www.airnorth.com.au/flying-with-us/before-you-fly/flying-when-pregnant

Travelling With Pets in Airnorth Airlines

  • Airnorth cannot accept check-in of any animals at their major airports counters.
  • All animals must be lodged with Qantas Freight 90 minutes prior to scheduled departure time.

For more details: https://www.airnorth.com.au/flying-with-us/before-you-fly/flying-with-animals

Queries handled by Airnorth Airlines Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy, None

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Airnorth Airlines in Darwin, Northern Territory, Australia Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Airnorth Airlines in Darwin, Northern Territory, Australia: (click on the stars below)
